carrier_pickup_days.description:
The days the carrier picks up shipments

            # Valid Values

            * 'Monday',
            * 'Tuesday',
            * 'Wednesday',
            * 'Thursday',
            * 'Friday',
            * 'Saturday',
            * 'Sunday'

order_cutoff_time.description:
For the given service_level or shipping_method, if an order is received before the 'order_cutoff_time', it will take 'n' days_to_fulfill the order

            # Valid Values
            * Time format must be recieved on a 24 hour clock in the local time this fulfillment node operates 'hh:mm'

days_to_fulfill.description: The number of business days it will take to fulfill this item if received by the 'order_cutoff_time'

last_pickup_time.description:
The time of day the carrier comes to pick up the shipments

            # Valid Values
            * Time format must be recieved on a 24 hour clock in the local time this fulfillment node operates 'hh:mm'
